protein.specific_function: Seems to bind zinc and copper. Could play a special role in regulating zinc metabolism during the differentiation of stratified epithelia

reference.reference_text: Quaife CJ, Findley SD, Erickson JC, Froelick GJ, Kelly EJ, Zambrowicz BP, Palmiter RD: Induction of a new metallothionein isoform (MT-IV) occurs during differentiation of stratified squamous epithelia. Biochemistry. 1994 Jun 14;33(23):7250-9.
